TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed AutomationElementMode extends System.Enum

Docs.summary: Contains values that specify the type of reference to use when returning UI Automation elements. These values are used in the property.These values are used in the property.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Complète est la valeur par défaut et spécifie que les éléments retournés contiennent une référence complète à sous-jacent [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_ui](~/includes/tlasharptla-ui-md.md)].Full is the default, and specifies that returned elements contain a full reference to the underlying [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_ui](~/includes/tlasharptla-ui-md.md)]. None Spécifie que les éléments retournés n’ont aucune référence à l’interface utilisateur sous-jacente et contient uniquement des informations mises en cache.None specifies that the returned elements have no reference to the underlying UI, and contain only cached information. Certaines opérations sur les éléments, tels que ou , requièrent une référence complète ; tente d’exécuter ces opérations sur un élément qui n’en a pas entraîne un .Certain operations on elements, such as or , require a full reference; attempting to perform these on an element that has none results in an . À l’aide de None peut être plus efficace lorsque seules des propriétés sont nécessaires, car il évite les surcharges impliquées dans la configuration de références complètes.Using None can be more efficient when only properties are needed, as it avoids the overhead involved in setting up full references. ## Examples L’exemple suivant montre comment définir le mode sur un .The following example shows how to set the mode on a . [!code-csharp[UIAClient_snip#183](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIAClient_snip/CSharp/ClientForm.cs#183)] [!code-vb[UIAClient_snip#183](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIAClient_snip/VisualBasic/ClientForm.vb#183)]

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElementMode Full = int32(1)

summary.span: Specifies that returned elements have a full reference to the underlying [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ui](~/includes/tla2sharptla-ui-md.md)].

span.span: Specifies that returned elements have a full reference to the underlying [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ui](~/includes/tla2sharptla-ui-md.md)].

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElementMode None = int32(0)

summary.span: Specifies that returned elements have no reference to the underlying [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ui](~/includes/tla2sharptla-ui-md.md)] and contain only cached information.

span.span: Specifies that returned elements have no reference to the underlying [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ui](~/includes/tla2sharptla-ui-md.md)] and contain only cached information.

summary.span: This mode might be used, for example, to retrieve the names of items in a list box without obtaining references to the items themselves.

span.span: This mode might be used, for example, to retrieve the names of items in a list box without obtaining references to the items themselves.
